remarks: Inference conjoining a consequent of a consequent to the left of the consequent in an implication.  Remark:  One can also prove this theorem using ~ syl and ~ jca (as done in ~ jccir ), which would be 4 bytes shorter, but one step longer than the current proof. (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (Contributed by AV, 20-Aug-2019.)
statement:
jccir.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
jccir.2 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
jccil $p |- ( ph -> ( ch /\ ps ) ) $.
